title: Iggy Pop - Rock Hard
description:
This consists of 2 shows, one recorded in New York 1988, the other in England 1994. 

The NY show is a sound board recording, the other is recorded from a radio broadcast. 

If you'd read Alvin Gibbs book (he was his bass player in 88), the NY show is the very same as described in the book: Andy Mccoy dissapeared hours before the show with a female fan- to do some poking and smoking some angel dust.. Obviously to little effect- he plays as good as ever! Listen to "Yor pretty face" and you'll see what I mean.. In my opinion-on that tour, Iggy had a kick ass backing band.

Enjoy
